overview: From 2025-07-21 to 2025-07-22, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 2 new issues, and 2 active contributors.

topIssues.title: load testing flashblocks on devnets
topIssues.author: yashvardhan-kukreja
topIssues.body:
A load test should be performed on eris-0 to ensure that it's ready to be served publicly with the quality of service we're expecting from it.

During the window of this load tests:
- The normal block progression should meet 99.95% of our SLA.
- The flashblocks should meet 99% availability (availability represented by a 250ms stream of flashblocks available)

topIssues.title: enable flashblocks on prod-mainnet-op-opn-geth-f-sequencer-0
topIssues.author: yashvardhan-kukreja
topIssues.body:
To progressively deploy flashblocks on mainnet, deploy it on one sequencer for the first time.

Evaluate its performance over a two-day window. Block progression should depict a 99.95% SLA over a 2-day window and flashblocks should be available 99% of the time.

topContributors.summary: 0x00101010: Focused on bugfix work, modifying 409 files with 4 commits, and also provided 2 review comments.

yashvardhan-kukreja: Focused on foundational work for flashblocks, creating two issues to enable flashblocks on prod-mainnet-op-opn-geth-f-sequencer-0 (ethereum-optimism/optimism#16759) and to initiate load testing on devnets (ethereum-optimism/optimism#16756).
